intro.heading: A passionate Computer Science graduate student with a strong affinity for AI, driven by innovation and committed to creating impactful solutions.

about.text: As a Master’s candidate in Computer Science at Purdue University, graduating in May 2025, I am currently a Graduate Research Assistant focused on applying LLMs in Digital Forensics. My technical journey, rooted at Anna University, includes roles at Striim Inc., Deep Cognition Inc., and Cardea Health, providing diverse experience across technology domains. I excel at transforming concepts into reality, delivering impactful AI and ML solutions. Outside of work, I enjoy swimming and playing trivia, balancing my professional aspirations with a sense of curiosity. I’m always excited to collaborate on cutting-edge Machine Learning and AI projects.
